alert.note: Alert for Edmonson; Grayson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 5:22PM EDT until July 06 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Grayson County in central Kentucky... North central Edmonson County in south central Kentucky... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 421 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Leitchfield, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Grayson and north central Edmonson Counties, including the following locations... Ponderosa, Peonia, Pearman, Wax, Meredith, Pine Springs, Conoloway, Huffman, Iberia and Dug Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
